title: BRIEF-Destination Maternity Reports Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.36
text:
56 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Destination Maternity Reports Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.36 Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Destination Maternity Corp: 
* DESTINATION MATERNITY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS * Q4 SALES $105.1 MILLION VERSUS $100.2 MILLION 
* DESTINATION MATERNITY - INTERNAL REORGANIZATION & COST CUTTING INITIATIVE LATE IN FISCAL 2017 CONTRIBUTED $5.2 MILLION REDUCTION IN SG&A FOR YEAR 
* ON TRACK TO EXCEED COMPANYâ€™S EXPECTATION TO GENERATE $10 MILLION IN ANNUALIZED SAVINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
